reviews.review_text: This book was a great read, especially for an Aussie, and provided a great look at 50's Australia. This book is autobiographical, and Hugh Lunn really know how to let us into his head, and he definitely isn't afraid to pull any punches. It is amazing to see how far we have come. With plenty of historical info, as well as a few good laughs, I recommend this book.

title: Over the Top with Jim
word_cloud: great especially provide great look autobiographical really know definitely afraid pull punch amaze far come plenty historical info well good laugh recommend
summary: Over the Top with Jim is the all-time biggest-selling memoir of an Australian childhood. Now available in a new edition, this is the unforgettable account of growing up in a working-class family in 1950s Australia - a story of boyhood friendship and adventure.
story_arc:
Bad luck, followed by promise, ending in a
                    final fall
